headline: Home Depot Reshapes Workforce While Betting On AI And Sustainable Growth
summary: Home Depot (NYSE:HD) is cutting about 800 corporate jobs as part of a broad restructuring. The company is requiring corporate staff to return to the office five days a week. Home Depot is rolling out a Material List Builder AI tool aimed at professional customers. The retailer is expanding sustainable offerings with a nationwide launch of organic seeds. For you as an investor, these moves touch both the front and back of the Home Depot story. The company is a major US home improvement...
